tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlantingActivity ( 
   activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   farmer_id INT, 
   tree_species VARCHAR(50), 
   planting_date DATE, 
   status VARCHAR(20) 
 );

CREATE TABLE trees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(100),
    planting_date DATE,
    height DOUBLE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE farmers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(200),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(150),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE trees (
  tree_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  tree_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  planting_date DATE,
  height DECIMAL,
  farmer_id INTEGER REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Trees (
    tree_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tree_species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE,
    tree_height FLOAT,
    farmer_id UUID REFERENCES Farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlantingActivities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_location VARCHAR(100),
    tree_id UUID REFERENCES Trees(tree_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AgroforestryProjects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    project_location VARCHAR(100),
    project_start_date DATE,
    project_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectProgress (
    progress_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    progress_description TEXT,
    progress_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES AgroforestryProjects(project_id)
);
